des: "This is my mother's recipe. Each year, she would make this for an auction. Her sauce usually sold for $12.00 an 8-ounce jar! Tastes best when it has had time to sit, for example, 2 weeks. The longer it sits, the stronger the flavours."
ins:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Stir the cranberries, white sugar, and bourbon together in a baking dish.
Bake in the preheated oven, stirring occasionally, until thick, about 1 hour.
